summary: I’m a Full Stack Designer who creates high-quality digital products to help businesses and their users achieve their goals. With my background in design and programming, I serve as a bridge between users, designers, and developers. I approach every problem with empathy, curiosity, and positivity to find a win-win solution.

jobSummary: Led web-focused research and design projects for clients such as The UPS Store, Merrill Lynch Bank of America, and Heartland Dental
Collaborated with client shareholders, project managers, and engineers to ensure the designs met all business requirements
Onboarded into the Engineering team to act as the liaison between the design and engineering teams
Conducted interviews and improved Yext Professional Services design system
Assisted the design manager in scoping and maintaining weekly scrum
Interviewed designer candidates and onboarded new hires
Created website mockups for the University of Maryland Honors College
Transferred the mockups to interactive web pages using CSS, HTML, and Javascript
Led a design team of 7 to produce marketing materials for the hackathon and its related events
Coordinated with other organizing teams to provide attendees with the best-in-class Hackathon experiences

sectionDetails.entryDetails: Figma, Sketch, User Research, User Testing, Prototyping, Adobe Creative Cloud

projectSummary: Led brainstorming sessions with the client team to align on design requirements and explore innovative branding applications for the front-end
Collaborated with the client to identify practical platform solutions tailored to their marketing team’s workflow

Integrated Figma variables into mockups, ensuring that live pages meet WCAG standards, regardless of branding colors
